name: CSC8502 Coursework prt 1
text: CSC8502 Coursework 2024/25. Coursework for my Graphics & rendering module. The code base was written using C++ & Opengl alongside shaders coded in GLSL.  Lighting, Tess & Geometry showcase: https://youtu.be/KN5iCqhPOUs Particle Render showcase: https://youtu.be/kmshfE3gGJ4 , Github: https://github.com/Alasdair-PB/CSC8502CourseWork
